about_the_game: Unleash your inner star with 10 sensational K-pop tracks in the 2nd FREE DLC for BOX to the BEAT! Dance to the infectious rhythms and catchy tunes as you deliver knockout punches in the K-pop pack, brought to you in partnership with Abu Dhabi Gaming. Packed with vibrant energy and dazzling beats!
detailed_description: Unleash your inner star with 10 sensational K-pop tracks in the 2nd FREE DLC for BOX to the BEAT! Dance to the infectious rhythms and catchy tunes as you deliver knockout punches in the K-pop pack, brought to you in partnership with Abu Dhabi Gaming. Packed with vibrant energy and dazzling beats!
